mapper.select:
SELECT u.nickname as `nickname`, u.face as `userFace`, c.sepc_name as `specName`, c.content as `content`, c.created_time as `createdTime` FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_comments c ON i.id = c.item_id LEFT JOIN users u on c.user_id = u.id WHERE i.id = #{paraMap.id}
AND c.comment_level = #{paraMap.level}

SELECT i.id as `itemId`, i.item_name as `itemName`, i.sell_counts as `sellCounts`, temp.price as `price`, img.url as `imgUrl` FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img img on i.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT spec.item_id as `item_id`, min(spec.price_discount) as `price` FROM items_spec spec GROUP BY spec.item_id ) temp on temp.item_id = i.id
WHERE img.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE #{paraMap.keywords}
AND i.cat_id = #{paraMap.catId}
ORDER BY
temp.price
i.sell_counts DESC
i.item_name

SELECT i.id as `itemId`, img.url as `itemImgUrl`, i.item_name as `itemName`, spec.id as `specId`, spec.`name` as `specName`, spec.price_discount as `priceDiscount`, spec.price_normal as `priceNormal` FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img img ON i.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN items_spec spec on i.id = spec.item_id WHERE img.is_main = 1 AND spec.id in
#{item}
